title: coreApi
description: the coreApi provided to each service at initialization time

core.description: runtime datas relative to the whole application

package.description: the package instance of the calling '@iztiar/iztiar-core' core module

config.description: the configuration instance filled-up from <configDir>/iztiar.json core configuration file

exports.description: the whole list of the definitions exported by the calling '@iztiar/iztiar-core' core module

service.description: the instance which describes the service from calling '@iztiar/iztiar-core' core module point of view
